title: Coronavirus Impacting Markets, China Standing and Global Businesses
itunes:title: Coronavirus Impacting Markets, China Standing and Global Businesses
description:
Peter Tchir, Head of Macro Strategy at Academy Securities, talks about the coronavirus and markets. Bloomberg News Distressed Debt Reporter Katherine Doherty discusses gym chains debt. For the Businessweek Economics segment, we’re joined by Bloomberg News Global Macro Strategist Vincent Cignarella and Bloomberg Economics Senior U.S. Economist Yelena Shulyatyeva. Andy Browne, Bloomberg New Economy Editorial Director, shares his insight on how the coronavirus threatens Xi Jinping and China on the global stage. And we Drive to the Close with Craig Johnson, Chief Market Technician at Piper Sandler.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Doni Holloway. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
